cells.data:
-- tails :: [a] -> [[a]]
on tails(xs)
    if class of xs is text then
        set xs_ to characters of xs
    else
        set xs_ to xs
    end if
    
    script
        on |λ|(_, i)
            items i thru -1 of xs_
        end |λ|
    end script
    
    map(result, xs_) & {{}}
end tails
